MAIN_SELECTION.ALLOW_READ_MESSAGES: Allow bot to read messages in this channel
MAIN_SELECTION.DENY_READ_MESSAGES: Deny bot to read messages in this channel
MAIN_SELECTION.INTERVAL: Change interval of auto-generating message in this channel
MAIN_SELECTION.WIPE: Wipe message history of this channel
MAIN_SELECTION.TITLE: GenAi configuration menu

PREFIX_MENU.PROMPT: Write your new prefix. Maximum length of prefix is 4 symbols

READ_MESSAGES.ALLOWED: now bot can read messages in this channel
READ_MESSAGES.DENIED: now bot cannot read messages in this channel

INTERVAL_MENU.PROMPT: Write interval of messages that you want to set for auto-generation in this channel. Minimum: %min%, maximum: %max%. Write `off` to disable auto-generation text
INTERVAL_MENU.DISABLED: successfully disabled auto-generation in this channel
INTERVAL_MENU.SUCCESSFULL: interval of auto-generating messages in this channel successfuly changed to `%interval%`

MENTION_MENU.DISABLED: mentions in generated messages have been successfully disabled
MENTION_MENU.ENABLED: mentions in generated messages have been successfully enabled

LINK_MENU.DELETE: links in generated messages have been successfully disabled
LINK_MENU.NOT_DELETE: links in generated messages have been successfully enabled

LIMIT_MENU.PROMPT: Write limit of getting last messages to generate strings. Minimum: %min%, maximum: %max%
LIMIT_MENU.SUCCESSFULL: limit of messages successfully changed to `%limit%`

WIPED: successfully wiped message history of this channel

RANDOM_INTERVAL.ENABLED: randomized interval for auto-generation successfully enabled
RANDOM_INTERVAL.DISABLED: randomized interval for auto-generation successfully disabled

TYPES.lobster: Text with Lobster font on image
TYPES.impact: Text with Impact font on image
TYPES.TITLE: Types configuration
TYPES.UPDATED: list of types for auto-generation successfully updated
TYPES.EMPTY_BITFIELD: you need to have enabled at least one type of generation.

MENTIONS_DESC: Toggle removing mentions from texts for this channel
LINKS_DESC: Toggle removing links from texts for this channel
WIPE_DESC: Wipe channel's messages history in database
RANDOM_INTERVAL_DESC: Toggle random interval for this channel
INTERVAL_DESC: Change interval of auto-generating of messages
